The outgoing damage reduction is provided by an aura, its debuff lingers for 0.5 seconds. The damage is independent from the aura. Applies unique damage manipulation on enemies within range. Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of damage manipulation. The reduction only affects physical damage from enemy sources that is not flagged as HP removal. Multiple instances of the aura do not stack.

name: Wraith Pact
description: A sentient amulet whose animus shakes the courage of even the strongest foes.
tips: Since Vladmir's Aura can't be toggled off, its status buff icon is always visible on creeps. Therefore it is possible to detect invisible enemy heroes holding Wraith Pact by checking enemy creeps' status buff icons.

The Wraith Pact Totem moves quite slowly, be sure to position it well in teamfights. Also, it automatically follows you around when cast, so if you're a frontliner, be sure that it doesn't stay too close to you or it'll become easy target for right-clicks.
